generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and serene full-bleed background featuring the very top of the leafy green tree branch from the front cover, extending down from the top edge. A few scattered, colorful confetti pieces drift gently downwards against a soft, off-white background. The entire design is rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible artistic brushstrokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture, creating a flat 2D artwork. The bottom-right corner is left intentionally blank and undecorated for logo or QR code placement. --style raw
generatedPrompts.frontCover: A charming and humorous watercolor illustration of a cartoon sloth wearing a tiny, crooked party hat, hanging upside down from a tree branch. The sloth is holding a single, lit birthday candle with a determined but very slow expression. Below the sloth, a patient tortoise, also wearing a party hat, looks up with a speech bubble that says, "We'll get there!" In the center, in a beautiful, readable, handwritten cursive script, the text reads: "Happy Birthday, Craig... eventually." The entire scene is rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible artistic brushstrokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture, creating a flat 2D artwork perfect for printing. --style raw
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A full-bleed decorative watercolor wash background. Soft, abstract splashes of the same greens, blues, and warm yellows from the front cover blend harmoniously across the page. A gentle cascade of colorful, painted confetti pieces drifts from the top-left corner towards the bottom-right, echoing the party theme. The design is rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible artistic brushstrokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture, creating a flat 2D artwork. --style raw
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A simple and elegant full-bleed background with a soft, off-white watercolor paper texture. A small, charming watercolor illustration of a single party hat, identical to the ones on the front cover, rests in the bottom-left corner. From the top-right corner, a delicate vine with green leaves hangs down slightly. The message from Jordan is not included in the artwork itself. The entire scene is rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible artistic brushstrokes and organic paint bleeds, creating a flat 2D artwork. --style raw
